text: vekul lilmu'minati yagdudne min ebsarihinne veyahfazne furucehunne vela yubdine zinetehunne illa ma zahera minha velyadribne bihumurihinne `ala cuyubihinn. vela yubdine zinetehunne illa libu`uletihinne ev abaihinne ev abai bu`uletihinne ev ebnaihinne ev ebnai bu`uletihinne ev ihvanihinne ev beni ihvanihinne ev beni ehavatihinne ev nisaihinne ev ma meleket eymanuhunne evi-ttabi`ine gayri uli-l'irbeti mine-rricali evi-ttifli-llezine lem yazheru `ala `avrati-nnisa'. vela yadribne bierculihinne liyu`leme ma yuhfine min zinetihinn. vetubu ile-llahi cemi`an eyyuhe-lmu'minune le`allekum tuflihun
